full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BLA RGYUD GSOL 'DEBS NI, RANG GI 'DOD @003B PA DANG, KHYAD PAR KU ZU BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL SOGS, RANG GZIGS PA RNAMS KYIS RGYUN DU BSKANG BA'I SNGON BU CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO'I BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS 'DON RGYU ZHIG DGOS ZER BA'I BLA DANG BSTUN NAS, CHOS RJE THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN BDAG GI BSGRIGS PA LA, MKHAS RNAMS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,YI GE PA NI PI LIG THU BLO BZANG RIG GROL LO, ,DGE'O, ,)
